text: The provisions of § 50-1301.43 shall not apply with respect to any such judgment arising out of an accident caused by the ownership or operation with permission, of a vehicle owned by or leased to the United States, a state or any political subdivision thereof, the District of Columbia or any political subdivision of the District of Columbia.

1973 Ed., § 40-460.

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Motor Vehicle Owners and Operators Responsibility.

heading.catch_text: Government vehicles; exception as to nonpayment of judgment provisions.
